synopsis.text:
She's late again, for the ninth consecutive day, and this time, high school student Saoko Andou is in for an even more challenging day than usual. As she rushes out of her house, she realizes that she's forgotten something crucial - her underwear! With her breasts feeling unusually unrestricted and a suspicious breeze under her skirt, Saoko must navigate through her school day, attempting to maintain her modesty amidst climbing stairs and changing for gym class.

Meanwhile, this self-proclaimed 'megaklutz' is not the only one grappling with her own set of complications. A collection of short stories unfolds, revealing the intricate love lives of eight middle and high school girls, their classmates, and even their relatives. As the stories interweave, a main narrative emerges, featuring a cast of characters who are all connected in unexpected ways.

Join Saoko and her friends as they stumble through their school days, each facing their own unique challenges and romantic entanglements, in this engaging and heartwarming anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
